title: Add Activity 3 “Next step” CTA to the admin Deployment Readiness banner

requirements.summary: Add an admin-only “next step” CTA in DeploymentReadinessBanner that navigates to the existing /activity-3 route without removing existing readiness actions.
acceptanceCriteria: When an admin user is logged in and the DeploymentReadinessBanner is visible, the banner includes a button/link labeled in English (e.g., "Go to Activity 3 Requirements").
Clicking the button navigates to the existing route "/activity-3" (Activity3RequirementsPage renders).
The CTA does not replace existing readiness actions (e.g., "Go to Admin Dashboard" when Stripe is not configured) and does not break the banner layout on small screens.
Non-admin users continue to never see the DeploymentReadinessBanner or the new CTA.

file_operations.description: Add a new secondary CTA button labeled like "Go to Activity 3 Requirements" that uses TanStack Router navigation to go to "/activity-3". Keep existing readiness CTAs (e.g., "Go to Admin Dashboard" when Stripe is not configured) intact by rendering both actions together in a responsive layout (e.g., wrap/stack on small screens). Ensure the CTA remains admin-only by relying on the existing admin gating (useIsCallerAdmin from the authorization-based access control). Use existing shadcn/ui Button composition (do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
